channel.description: Slightly left of center economic commentary on news, politics and the economy.

item.title: I’m sooooo not happy that my main email account was hacked today…
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: … but I’m really grateful that so many friends and acquaintances, including Dan C., have let me know. (My favorite, from my friend “A”: “Beverly, someone is sending spam around in your name!”) I’m luckier than the Bush family, though. At least whoever hacked my account just wanted to use my email identity to try […]
item.content:encoded:
… but I’m really grateful that so many friends and acquaintances, including Dan C., have let me know.  (My favorite, from my friend “A”: “Beverly, someone is sending spam around in your name!”)

I’m luckier than the Bush family, though.  At least whoever hacked my account just wanted to use my email identity to try to sell a diet plan, not send photos of me in the shower or shaving (my legs).  Much less, send pictures I’ve painted (with finger paints, back in kindergarten).
